definition: to tell on sb/to complain (to a teacher, a superior etc)/to bring a lawsuit
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
accusation/suit/state/condition/strong/great/-shaped
the guilty party files the suit/the thief cries thief

sentences.english: Before Mei filed her complaint about Hong to her husband, Hong disappeared suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 還沒等梅婧向葉城告狀，洪小玲卻突然失蹤了。

sentences.english: The plaintiff was fat, with a triangular head.
sentences.chinese: 告狀人很胖，長着一個三角腦袋。

sentences.english: He claimed that he must go to techniques namely original there.
sentences.chinese: 他聲稱一定要去土肥原那裏告狀。

sentences.english: He rebuked Lou, director of the stolen property, threatening to the wild man there.
sentences.chinese: 他斥責盧局長私吞公物，揚言要到野夫那裏告狀。

sentences.english: Nick:We used to have a lot of people who liked to tattletale in our class.
sentences.chinese: 以前我們班級裏面也是總有愛告狀的人。

sentences.english: It was in the street, he accidentally received a petition to Beijing to complain to the case.
sentences.chinese: 那是他在街上無意中受理的一個進京上訪告狀案。

sentences.english: Let's take a closer look at tattling .
sentences.chinese: 讓我們進一步觀察濫告狀的行爲。

sentences.english: Sue in court lord the son is there reckon what capability.
sentences.chinese: 告狀到主子那裏算什麼本事。

definition: to be furious/to fly into a terrible rage
spitting anger (idiom); in a rage
to reprimand/to rebuke/to berate/stern criticism
(accounting) to balance the books/to do the accounts/(fig.) to settle an account/to get one's revenge
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
to lament/to complain tearfully/to wail accusingly
to condemn in speech and in writing (idiom)/to denounce by word and pen
to feel indignant/to feel aggrieved
to slander/to smear/to vilify
to talk back/to answer back
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it
to strive for favor
sullen/to scowl miserably
to abuse roundly
to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
